data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rG-b7yjX3_8Q7kNvgHS1YbZ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBzk_lSgnY2vxN6L3k7ilK5MbRafu46OvTEvQ2h62pXeQ&oe=6648919C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kfC08eESjGAQ7kNvgEgoqHt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD35wu_4pcG_d1jyMuZmP1OLCsI4e0xJX0UeIRX9WdWUw&oe=66489B24)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Dkoede4OYQ8Q7kNvgEyEr8K&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCCuspoYat5zoZljx3iI0Be9U_a_RIyjWOiYboncZ0qCQ&oe=66488287)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=P7K-_HU5sUMQ7kNvgE8eOFj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDflv3-7_5jt_nfADouF4w4rKQ-ASLIwM4cb-h64_BpsQ&oe=66487566)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=O9GjSl2ONd0Q7kNvgG3d6iB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCWgWLNO4yvvCzBPTZK_0ZFY_tUdkW6u0BFbF4BZ6wVMw&oe=6648A1D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wS7TRgtwr88Q7kNvgEJ3Rpu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD56jA7VTwPuEodXEFeR1mOm79Gv3GmVXxRzfHlXChh2Q&oe=66489E59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LWoYiC5TohwQ7kNvgENZY1T&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCJSD-DUJ410DgAMdNDvOV7w6NKbeomtHCUUK_eLeUGSA&oe=66488470)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2zKIDRSIg1wQ7kNvgEWsLxC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCn6y9Wc3jnSJ25I4MKUdspKufydgE21NQUw0B9-ev7qQ&oe=66486EEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=yAk9Na8lCV8Q7kNvgF7atcl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDSlUMA9ofcDyholqiu3Lo3hmmkc_D6Eax5wV9YogBytg&oe=66488297)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QUIHe6jD-58Q7kNvgHoZpYF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_-iv4-8hpSq9x-22Gkl_CZyIdSfp0n5R7YIxIOuqedQ&oe=66489E0C)
